Class jsonCLI

java.lang.Object
jsonCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class jsonCLI extends Object implements Runnable
This class is responsible for parsing the command line options and arguments and producing the required description(s)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    depth
     
    protected String
    filename
    Command line parameter for specifying the input JSON file.
    protected boolean
    full
    Command line option to generate a full description of the JSON file, including values of key-value pairs.
    protected boolean
    nesting
    Command line option for the level of nesting to be explicitly specified before each complex element is described.
    protected boolean
    objects
    Command line option to generate description only including details of the complex elements within the file (objects and arrays).
    protected String
    outputFile
    Command line option for the description to be written to a separate text file for easier use with a screen reader.
    protected boolean
    readAloud
    Command line option for the description to be read aloud.
    protected boolean
    topLevel
    Command line option to generate top level description of JSON file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Parses command line arguments and creates new command line object
    void
    run()
    Passes the command line arguments to the jsonRun.describe method If an output file is specified, writes description to output file location If the readAloud option is enabled, the TextToSpeech.speakString() method is invoked

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • topLevel

      protected boolean topLevel
      Command line option to generate top level description of JSON file. Enabled using "-tl" or "--Toplevel".

    • objects

      protected boolean objects
      Command line option to generate description only including details of the complex elements within the file (objects and arrays). Enabled using "-oa" or "--objectsAndArrays".

    • full

      protected boolean full
      Command line option to generate a full description of the JSON file, including values of key-value pairs. Enabled using "-f" or "--full"

    • depth

      protected int depth

    • outputFile

      protected String outputFile
      Command line option for the description to be written to a separate text file for easier use with a screen reader. The file can be specified using "-o=" or "--outputFile="

    • readAloud

      protected boolean readAloud
      Command line option for the description to be read aloud. Can be enabled with the flag "-r" or "--readAloud".

    • nesting

      protected boolean nesting
      Command line option for the level of nesting to be explicitly specified before each complex element is described. Can be enabled with the flag "-n" or "--nesting".

    • filename

      protected String filename
      Command line parameter for specifying the input JSON file. The input file is specified with the flag "filepath" =

  • Constructor Details

    • jsonCLI

      public jsonCLI()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Passes the command line arguments to the jsonRun.describe method If an output file is specified, writes description to output file location If the readAloud option is enabled, the TextToSpeech.speakString() method is invoked
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Parses command line arguments and creates new command line object

      args -
